alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Murray (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:11PM EDT until July 01 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Murray County in northwestern Georgia... Northeastern Gordon County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 511 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Audubon, or 9 miles northeast of Calhoun, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Resaca, Fairmount, Ranger, Carters, Ramhurst, Oakman, Redbud, Nickelsville, North Georgia Speedway and Audubon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
